hey my dude the plasma pirate connection is actually deeper than you may think the staff that Ghetsis hold is actually VERY similar to the symbol known a the Chi Rho which wa a symbol historically used by soldier of the Crusades a it symbolized the greek name for Christ an interesting fact on it own a the grunt are dressed in medieval styled armor Ghetsis wear ornate robe like the Pope and they have a much more religious feel to their goal even lifting N up a a potential savior this is not where it end it is commonly thought that many of the soldier after the Crusades took to the sea becoming pirate and throughout when one wa killed their skull and bone arranged similarly to the Chi Rho to send a message thus when they became pirate they adopted this morbid signal a the death of the Crusaders becoming the Jolly Roger Pokemon get straight deep

Actually the association between Mars and Tuesday isn t coincidental In Germanic and Romance language many day of the week are tied to the name of deity and astral body Sun day Monday moon day Tues day tyr tiu s day in English and Martedi Mars day in Italian Wednesday W odin s day in English and Mercoledi Mercury day in Italian Thursday Thor s day in English and Giovedi Jupiter day in Italian Friday Freyr Freya or Frigg s day in English and Venerdi Venus day in Italian and finally Saturday Saturn s day

Her name is Tuesday because in most European language many day of the week are named after god or celestial body Sunday Monday are the sun day and moon day Tuesday is war after Tyr sday Nordic god of War Wednesday is Odin Woden sday Thursday is Thor sday Friday is Freya day and Saturday is Saturn day
